verses.verse: Bless <WH1288> the LORD, <WH3068> O my soul. <WH5315> O LORD <WH3068> my God, <WH430> you are very <WH3966> great; <WH1431> you are clothed <WH3847> with honor <WH1935> and majesty. <WH1926>
Who cover <WH5844> yourself with light <WH216> as with a garment: <WH8008> who stretch <WH5186> out the heavens <WH8064> like a curtain: <WH3407>

Who lays <WH7760> the beams <WH7136> of his chambers <WH5944> in the waters: <WH4325> who makes <WH7760> the clouds <WH5645> his chariot: <WH7398> who walks <WH1980> on the wings <WH3671> of the wind: <WH7307>
Who makes <WH6213> his angels <WH4397> spirits; <WH7307> his ministers <WH8334> a flaming <WH3857> fire: <WH784>
Who laid the foundations <WH4349> of the earth, <WH776> that it should not be removed <WH4131> for ever. <WH5769> <WH5703>
You covered <WH3680> it with the deep <WH8415> as with a garment: <WH3830> the waters <WH4325> stood <WH5975> above <WH5921> the mountains. <WH2022>
At <WH4480> your rebuke <WH1606> they fled; <WH5127> at <WH4480> the voice <WH6963> of your thunder <WH7482> they hurried <WH2648> away.
They go <WH5927> up by the mountains; <WH2022> they go <WH3381> down <WH3381> by the valleys <WH1237> to the place <WH4725> which <WH2088> you have founded <WH3245> for them.
You have set <WH7760> a bound <WH1366> that they may not pass <WH5674> over; <WH5674> that they turn <WH7725> not again <WH7725> to cover <WH3680> the earth. <WH776>
He sends <WH7971> the springs <WH4599> into the valleys, <WH5158> which run <WH1980> among <WH996> the hills. <WH2022>
They give drink <WH8248> to every <WH3605> beast <WH2416> of the field: <WH7704> the wild <WH6501> asses <WH6501> quench <WH7665> their thirst. <WH6772>
By them shall the fowls <WH5775> of the heaven <WH8064> have their habitation, <WH7931> which sing <WH5414> <WH6963> among <WH996> the branches. <WH6073>
He waters <WH8248> the hills <WH2022> from his chambers: <WH5944> the earth <WH776> is satisfied <WH7646> with the fruit <WH6529> of your works. <WH4639>

He causes the grass <WH2682> to grow <WH6779> for the cattle, <WH929> and herb <WH6212> for the service <WH5656> of man: <WH120> that he may bring <WH3318> forth <WH3318> food <WH3899> out of the earth; <WH776>

And wine <WH3196> that makes glad <WH8056> the heart <WH3824> of man, <WH582> and oil <WH8081> to make his face <WH6440> to shine, <WH6670> and bread <WH3899> which strengthens <WH5582> man's <WH582> heart. <WH3824>
The trees <WH6086> of the LORD <WH3068> are full <WH7654> of sap; the cedars <WH730> of Lebanon, <WH3844> which <WH834> he has planted; <WH5193>
Where <WH834> <WH8033> the birds <WH6833> make their nests: <WH7077> as for the stork, <WH2624> the fir <WH1265> trees are her house. <WH1004>
The high <WH1364> hills <WH2022> are a refuge <WH4268> for the wild <WH3277> goats; <WH3277> and the rocks <WH5553> for the conies. <WH8227>
He appointed <WH6213> the moon <WH3394> for seasons: <WH4150> the sun <WH8121> knows <WH3045> his going <WH3996> down.
You make <WH7896> darkness, <WH2822> and it is night: <WH3915> wherein all <WH3605> the beasts <WH2416> of the forest <WH3293> do creep <WH7430> forth.
The young <WH3715> lions <WH3715> roar <WH7580> after their prey, <WH2964> and seek <WH1245> their meat <WH400> from God. <WH410>
The sun <WH8121> rises, <WH2224> they gather <WH622> themselves together, and lay <WH7257> them down <WH7257> in their dens. <WH4585>
Man <WH120> goes <WH3318> forth <WH3318> to his work <WH6467> and to his labor <WH5656> until <WH5704> the evening. <WH6153>
O LORD, <WH3068> how <WH4100> manifold <WH7231> are your works! <WH4639> in wisdom <WH2451> have you made <WH6213> them all: <WH3605> the earth <WH776> is full <WH4390> of your riches. <WH7075>

So is this <WH2088> great <WH1419> and wide <WH7342> <WH3027> sea, <WH3220> wherein <WH8033> are things creeping <WH7431> innumerable, <WH7342> <WH3027> both small <WH6996> and great <WH1419> beasts. <WH2416>
There <WH8033> go <WH1980> the ships: <WH591> there is that leviathan, <WH3882> whom you have made <WH3335> to play <WH7832> therein.
These wait <WH7663> all <WH3605> on you; that you may give <WH5414> them their meat <WH400> in due season. <WH6256>
That you give <WH5414> them they gather: <WH3950> you open <WH6605> your hand, <WH3027> they are filled <WH7646> with good. <WH2896>
You hide <WH5641> your face, <WH6440> they are troubled: <WH926> you take <WH622> away their breath, <WH7307> they die, <WH1478> and return <WH7725> to their dust. <WH6083>
You send <WH7971> forth your spirit, <WH7307> they are created: <WH1254> and you renew <WH2318> the face <WH6440> of the earth. <WH127>
The glory <WH3519> of the LORD <WH3068> shall endure <WH1961> for ever: <WH5769> the LORD <WH3068> shall rejoice <WH8055> in his works. <WH4639>
He looks <WH5027> on the earth, <WH776> and it trembles: <WH7460> he touches <WH5060> the hills, <WH2022> and they smoke. <WH6225>
I will sing <WH7891> to the LORD <WH3068> as long <WH5704> as I live: <WH2416> I will sing <WH2167> praise to my God <WH430> while <WH5750> I have my being. <WH5750>
My meditation <WH7879> of him shall be sweet: <WH6149> I will be glad <WH8056> in the LORD. <WH3068>

Let the sinners <WH2400> be consumed <WH8552> out of the earth, <WH776> and let the wicked <WH7563> be no <WH369> more. <WH5750> Bless <WH1288> you the LORD, <WH3068> O my soul. <WH5315> Praise <WH1984> you the LORD. <WH3050>
